title: h5 file not found for the multi_animal tracking

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Hi, 
I am trying to use the multi_animal tracking features to track individual whiskers of a rat. After training and analysis of the videos, I have found some errors in the tracking. I tried to use the deeplabcut.extract_outlier_frames. It gives me the following error:
```

_### IndexError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-53-629ee7a9d71f> in <module>
     21 #deeplabcut.extract_outlier_frames(path_config_file,video,outlieralgorithm='uncertain',p_bound=.6)
     22 #deeplabcut.extract_outlier_frames(path_config_file,video,outlieralgorithm='uncertain',comparisonbodyparts =  ['nose','snout'],p_bound=.6)
---> 23 deeplabcut.extract_outlier_frames(path_config_file,video,outlieralgorithm='uncertain',p_bound=.9,shuffle=2)
     24 

~\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\refine_training_dataset\outlier_frames.py in extract_outlier_frames(config, videos, videotype, shuffle, trainingsetindex, outlieralgorithm, comparisonbodyparts, epsilon, p_bound, ARdegree, MAdegree, alpha, extractionalgorithm, automatic, cluster_resizewidth, cluster_color, opencv, savelabeled, destfolder, modelprefix, track_method)
    152         shuffle,
    153         trainFraction=cfg["TrainingFraction"][trainingsetindex],
--> 154         modelprefix=modelprefix,
    155     )
    156 

~\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxiliaryfunctions.py in GetScorerName(cfg, shuffle, trainFraction, trainingsiterations, modelprefix)
    552         increasing_indices = np.argsort([int(m.split("-")[1]) for m in Snapshots])
    553         Snapshots = Snapshots[increasing_indices]
--> 554         SNP = Snapshots[snapshotindex]
    555         trainingsiterations = (SNP.split(os.sep)[-1]).split("-")[-1]
    556 

IndexError: index -1 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size_ 
```
 and I checked the folder and I have realized that I don't have .h5 files. Would you please help me understand the source of the error?
